text: Oisín (; often incorrectly spelled Oisin) is a 1970 Irish short documentary film directed by Patrick Carey. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==Overview== A short film made by the Department of Land as a contribution to European Conservation Year 1970, capturing the rhythms of Ireland's natural beauty. ==References== ==External links== *Oisín at the Irish Film Archive * Category:1970 films Category:Irish films Category:English-language films Category:Irish documentary films Category:Irish short films Category:1970s short documentary films
title: Oisín (film)
